channel.title: Training Equipment
channel.description: So I recently added the 474 training equipment since I don't believe it was in the 317 revision and I was wondering if anyone could help me make the arrows stackable and the server recognize the bow well as a bow. I use delta and a non renamed client I already have all the ints for all the stacks of the arrows I just need to know how to make them stackable. [IMG]http://i1064.photobucket.com/albums/u380/ScapeRune_rsps/TrainingEquipment.png[/img]

item.title: Training Equipment

So I recently added the 474 training equipment since I don’t believe it was in the 317 revision and I was wondering if anyone could help me make the arrows stackable and the server recognize the bow well as a bow. I use delta and a non renamed client I already have all the ints for all the stacks of the arrows I just need to know how to make them stackable.
